channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Now, gold sign outside Oval Office is slammed: Why is Trump obsessed with all that glitters?
2025 is the year of Gen-Z protests. Have they erupted in PoK now?
Pakistan army for sale? Did Asim Munir demand $10,000 a soldier from Israel for peacekeeping in Gaza?
Why rat-hunting bats have sparked pandemic fears
What happens if Donald Trump loses tariffs case in US Supreme Court?
'Vibe coding' is the 2025 word of the year by Collins Dictionary. What does it mean?
Will Zohran Mamdani transform New York into a Khalistan safe haven?
item.description: Zohran Mamdani embraces cosmetic diversity, but his record with the Democratic Socialists of America and at Bowdoin College suggests he is intolerant of diversity of views

item.title: Head-on | Trump-Xi G2 duopoly is not the future world order
item.description: Indian policymakers and analysts are easily swayed by the optics around the US-China G2 duopoly. A closer look reveals how tenuous the G2 formulation is

item.title: Afghanistan-Pakistan meet in Istanbul: Will it cement the fragile ceasefire?
item.description: Turkey and Qatar will ensure that the Istanbul meeting results in a ‘positive’ outcome

item.title: Not a tactical ploy, Trump’s G2 framework represents a fundamental shift in US perception towards China
item.description: Washington now accepts Beijing as a peer power in sharing responsibility for global leadership, complicating India’s grand strategy.

item.title: How America’s tariff nationalism is wrecking its China strategy
item.description: Washington cannot rally the world against Beijing’s economic coercion while firing tariff salvos at its own allies

item.title: How Turkiye’s Uyghur resettlement plan is aiding China’s ethnic cleansing in East Turkistan
item.description: East Turkistan is the motherland of all Turkic peoples. Legitimising Uyghurs’ displacement would make Ankara responsible for the final destruction of the Turkic homeland itself
